hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: privatekey
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: Private DSA Key for accessing hosts when building a cloud.

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: publickey
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: Public DSA Key for accessing hosts when building a cloud.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash keydir=~/.ssh mkdir -p $keydir chmod 700 $keydir
cat > $keydir/id_rsa <<EOF $privatekey EOF
cat > $keydir/id_rsa.pub <<EOF $publickey EOF
cat > $keydir/authorized_keys <<EOF $publickey EOF
chmod 600 $keydir/*
